titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the Parish-Church of Bridgewater, July 16, 1693, before the Right Reverend Father in God, Richard, Lord Bishop of Bath and Wells, at a confirmation by Fran. Prode ...
titleStmt.author: Prowde, Francis, 1653 or 4-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.H. for W. Rogers ...,

notesStmt.note: Half title: Mr. Prowde's confirmation-sermon preached at Bridgewater, July 16, 1693.
